title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Passengers,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Passengers, 

Freight and Mail by Air) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (carriage passenger freight mail air) order 2020

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 2. (1) In this Order -
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order - 

“Act of 1993” means the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993); 

“Annex” means Annex I to the Regulation; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EC) No. 437/2003 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 27 February 20031, as amended by 
Commission Regulation (EC) No. 1358/2003 of 31 July 20032 (as 
amended by Commission Regulation (EC) No 158/2007 of 16 February 
20073), Commission Regulation (EC) No. 546/2005 of 8 April 20054, 
Council Regulation (EC) No. 1791/2006 of 20 November 20065, 
Regulation (EC) No. 219/2009 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 11 March 20096 and Council Regulation (EU) No. 517/2013 
of 13 May 20137; 

1 OJ No. L 66, 11.3.2003, p. 1. 
2 OJ No. L 194, 1.8.2003, p. 9. 
3 OJ No. L 49, 17.2.2007, p. 9. 
4 OJ No. L 91, 17.12.2008, p. 5. 
5 OJ No. L 363, 20.12.2006, p. 1. 
6 OJ No. L 87, 31.3.2009, p. 109. 
7 OJ No. L 158, 10.6.2013, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [10] 3 

“survey” means the survey that is conducted by the Central Statistics 
Office for the purpose of obtaining information specified in Articles 3 
and 4 from authorities of airports specified in the Schedule, other than 
in relation to the authority of the airport specified in paragraph 3 of Part 
2 thereof, including for the purpose of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and is also used in the 
Regulation has, unless the contrary intention appears, the same meaning in this 
Order as it has in the Regulation.

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 3. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport
text_raw:
3. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport 
referred to in Part 1 of the Schedule to provide, for the purposes of the survey, 
information in relation to the airport in accordance with Tables A and B of the 
Annex is prescribed for the purposes of section 25 of the Act of 1993. 

(2) The airport authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in paragraph (1) shall provide the relevant 
information - 

(a) where the information relates to December 2019, once only, and 

(b) monthly, and in relation to the immediately preceding month in 

the period from February 2020 to December 2024.
text_norm: 3 (1) requirement airport authority manages airport referred part 1 schedule provide purpose survey information relation airport accordance table b annex prescribed purpose section 25 act 1993 (2) airport authority relation requirement provide information prescribed paragraph (1) shall provide relevant information - (a) information relates december 2019 (b) monthly relation immediately preceding month period february 2020 december 2024

title: relation to paragraph 3 of Part 2 of the Schedule to the following order, for the
heading: 4. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport
text_raw:
4. (1) A requirement on an airport authority that manages an airport 
referred to in Part 1 or 2 of the Schedule to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information in relation to the airport in accordance with Table C of the 
Annex is prescribed for the purposes of section 25 of the Act of 1993. 

(2) The airport authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed in paragraph (1) shall provide the relevant 
information - 

(a) where the information relates to 2019, once only, and 

(b) 

annually, and in relation to the immediately preceding year, in 
the period 2021 to 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [10]
text_norm: 4 (1) requirement airport authority manages airport referred part 1 2 schedule provide purpose survey information relation airport accordance table c annex prescribed purpose section 25 act 1993 (2) airport authority relation requirement provide information prescribed paragraph (1) shall provide relevant information - (a) information relates 2019 (b) annually relation immediately preceding year period 2021 2024 4 10
